040db3e9-85a0-429b-9f84-4120251bd29b: This character has a morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, and is immune to both fear and charm effects. At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s duration, they will become fatigued.
afb997e7-fe2a-40dd-a318-8f1db7c89cc1: This creature is carried along by the tsunami.
dc419c99-b71d-462e-8f38-0071c62e0c28: This scroll allows you to end all ongoing anomaly distortion effects on a chosen target.
24a89dcd-6ff6-434d-b9a9-e30cafad4a61: This secret allows you to avoid a disaster that would have otherwise occurred. Whenever you or any other friendly creature within the area of effect fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} during the secret's duration, but would have succeeded with an insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, the saving throw succeeds and the effect of the secret immediately ends.
b54d6c65-06ec-48cd-b282-29c0ac593d34: This secret allows you to steadily succeed at the tasks along your path. You and any other friendly creatures within the area of effect gain a +6 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g} with their highest ability score or an ability score tied to be the highest.
88844d91-abe7-4c12-a115-376501a31261: This secret allows you to succeed in a task you would have otherwise failed. Whenever you or any other friendly creature within the area of effect fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} during the duration, but would have succeeded with an insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} on this {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} succeeds and the effect of the secret immediately ends.
4d28c067-516d-4af8-9a90-ef49e5096bbd: This secret banishes extraplanar creatures, forcing them out of your home plane. It acts like a banishment {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, banishing as many as 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} of creatures per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this spell is increased by 2 against creatures of chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
4b34e4e2-9026-4375-b65a-531041751623: This secret subdues all hostile creatures within range. Humanoid creatures whose number of {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} is less or equal to half your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 10) lose their will to fight completely, leave their worldly possessions and weapons on the spot and leave to travel the world seeking salvation. Other creatures whose number of Hit Dice is less or equal to your caster level become frightened, fleeing from you. Creatures with more HD than your caster level are instead fascinated — any aggressive {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} against one of these creatures breaks the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s effect. This is a mind-affecting effect. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this spell is increased by 2 against creatures of chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
fb550fe0-5014-4b5e-b04c-372a1184f1e3: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} allows you to peer into the secrets of Suramgamin briefly and uses them for your benefit. There are five secrets, and you choose one every time you cast this spell. Only good characters can use this spell.
9c77d01b-19ca-4a8b-9aa6-d097c0e236e6: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} allows you to take the form of a wide variety of creatures. This spell can function as beast shape IV, elemental body IV and dragonkind III depending on what form you take. You can change form once each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. The change takes place either immediately before your regular {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} or immediately after it, but not during the action.
8da7e817-84cf-40b8-be2d-a0f50bc7ebaa:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like dominate person, except that the spell is not restricted by creature type.
Dominate Person: You can make any humanoid creature fight on your side as if it was your ally. It will {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability. However, this creature will try to throw off the domination, making a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
4a5b1776-46d6-4725-8fb5-7005a7611bb9:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like hold person, except it targets all hostile creatures within a 30-foot radius from the target and holds any living creature that fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}.
Hold Person: The subject becomes paralyzed and freezes in place. It is aware and breathes normally but cannot take any {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}, even speech. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, the subject may attempt a new saving throw to end the effect.
448949e7-42f6-4df6-8c36-49b0eb48842a:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like mind blank, except it affects all party members and it lasts for 4 hours.
Mind Blank: This spell grants a +8 resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against all mind-affecting spells and effects. The subject is also protected from all items, spells, and other effects that gather information about the target through divination magic (such as thoughtsense, true seeing, and see invisibility).
8201c42e-ffcf-4f44-b953-8a440330907d:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like phantasmal killer, except it can affect more than one creature. Only the affected creatures see the phantasmal creatures {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacking{/g} them, though you see the attackers as shadowy shapes.
If a subject's {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} succeeds, it still takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and is stunned for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. The subject also takes 1d4 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} damage.
Phantasmal Killer: You create a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the subject simply by forming the fears of the subject's subconscious mind into something that its conscious mind can visualize: this most horrible beast. Only the spell's subject can see the phantasmal killer. You see only a vague shape. The target first gets a Will save to recognize the image as unreal. If that save fails, the phantasm touches the subject, and the subject must succeed on a Fortitude save or die from fear. Even if the Fortitude save is successful, the subject takes 3d6 points of damage.
50a0d7fb-c32d-4a2b-a75e-d50ddf638cf1: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like shadow conjuration, except that it mimics conjuration spells of 8th level or lower. The illusory conjurations created deal four-fifths (80%) {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to nonbelievers, and non-damaging effects are 80% likely to work against nonbelievers.
4634c1b9-67f2-4229-a880-d56051f298b0:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g}, except it targets all creatures within a 30-foot radius. The maximum number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} restored to each creature is 250.
Heal: Heal enables you to channel positive energy into a creature to wipe away {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}injury{/g} and afflictions. It immediately ends any and all of the following adverse conditions affecting the target: {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}, blinded, confused, dazed, dazzled, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, nauseated, poisoned, sickened, and stunned. It also cures 10 hit points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per level of the caster, to a maximum of 150 points at 15th level.
Heal does not remove negative levels or restore permanently drained {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} points.
If used against an undead creature, heal instead acts like harm.
8dea9670-f145-4c4f-800d-ea86d6dd0c1f: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} opens a portal to an Elemental Plane and summons elementals from it. When the spell is complete, {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d4{/g} large elementals appear. Five {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} later, 1d4 huge elementals appear. Five rounds after that, one greater elemental appears. The summoned elementals appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
50740f56-8bae-48c0-85df-71fbe6b94873: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} summons to your side a purple worm with the advanced creature template. The summoned ally appears where you designate and acts according to its {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. It {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability.
213350ef-04c1-4d02-a49f-7f4e4f316bf9:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} transforms your body into living flame. You and your equipment are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}. In fact, every time you would normally take {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from fire, you are instead {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} of damage at a rate of 1 point per 3 points of damage the fire {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} would have normally inflicted. You are immune to blindness, {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} damage, disease, electricity, poison, and stunning. You have acid resistance 30. You take 150% as much damage from cold as normal.
You have a +6 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} score. Your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attack{/g} deals an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of fire damage, and you are considered armed when making unarmed attacks. Fire spells you cast have their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} DCs increased by +1.
3cbee036-4b29-48c3-8158-f3438852f0f0: Using words of ancient power, you bestow heroic powers on all creatures subject to this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +4 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, gain {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g}+4 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, and become immune to both fear and charm effects for the spell's duration.
7fc4f587-c4ec-4d44-ad87-4eeb94878a71: When you cast this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you emit a terrible, soul-chilling scream that possibly kills creatures that hear it (except for yourself), inflicting 10 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
d39d785c-bca1-48d1-b71d-16ca7025b1cc:
You create a massive wave of water that then moves in a straight line across land at a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} of 50 feet per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Creatures struck by a tsunami take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}24d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} (a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} halves this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}).
In addition, every creature must succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics check{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility check{/g} against the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} or be knocked prone and carried along by the wave.
Freedom of movement prevents a creature from being carried along by a tsunami but does not prevent damage caused by it hitting a creature.
48e61fa4-8f3b-4483-9feb-5ef4761f4d17:
You create two Colossal-sized masses of rock, dirt, and stone and slam them together against a single creature between them. The clashing rocks appear up to 30 feet away from the target on opposite sides and rush toward it with a mighty grinding crash. You must make a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit the target with the rocks. The clashing rocks ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}. A creature struck by the clashing rocks takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}20d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} and is knocked prone.
If the clashing rocks miss the target, the target still takes 10d6 points of bludgeoning {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from falling rocks and is knocked prone. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} reduces this damage to half and the target remains standing. Creatures other than the target that occupy the spaces where the clashing rocks appear or within their path must also make Reflex saves or take 10d6 points of bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone (save for half and remain standing).
45ae6898-08f3-4c5a-a63e-bc99bcfa9313:
You plunge an area into the brutal chill of the arctic night.
All creatures in the area take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} and 1d6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} each round negates the {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}Dexterity damage{/g} but not the cold damage.
c02c66ee-41c1-41cd-8a67-470650840ba7:
You point your finger and fire a black ray of negative energy that suppresses the life force of any living creature it strikes. You must make a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to hit. If you hit, the subject gains {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d4{/g} temporary negative levels. Negative levels stack.[LONGSTART]
Twenty-four hours after gaining them, the subject must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = energy drain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s save DC) for each negative level. If the save succeeds, that negative level is removed. If it fails, that negative level becomes permanent.
An undead creature struck by the ray gains 2d4 × 5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} for 1 hour.[LONGEND]
280abe4e-9a53-43fd-90d5-344a4bd95175:
You surround yourself with a buffeting shroud of supernatural, tornado-force winds. These winds grant you a fly {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} of 60 feet with perfect {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuverability{/g}. Neither your armor nor your load affects this fly speed. The winds shield you from any other wind effects, and form a shell of breathable air around you, allowing you to fly and breathe underwater or in outer space.
You have total {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g}. Gases and most gaseous breath weapons cannot pass though the winds.
In addition, when a creature hits you with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, you can shape your winds so they lash out at that creature as an immediate {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}. The creature must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude Saving Throw{/g} or take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} and be knocked prone (if on the ground). On a failed save, Huge flying creatures are {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checked{/g} and Large-sized or smaller flying creatures are blown away instead of knocked prone.
On a successful save, the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is halved and the creature is not knocked prone (or checked or blown away).
89e0bb97-03bb-4194-adbe-8bd09f761cce:
Your body is a living flame. You and your equipment are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}. In fact, every time you would normally take {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from fire, you are instead {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} of damage at a rate of 1 point per 3 points of damage the fire {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} would have normally inflicted. You are immune to blindness, {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} damage, disease, electricity, poison, and stunning. You have acid resistance 30. You take 150% as much damage from cold as normal.
You have a +6 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} score. Your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attack{/g} deals an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of fire damage, and you are considered armed when making unarmed attacks. Fire {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast have their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} DCs increased by +1.
